sections.title: Welcome
sections.md:
##Welcome

Hi, my name is Zhixuan Lai. I am a undergraduate student at UCLA interested in client side application and programming language.

sections.title: Projects
sections.md:
##Projects

I have played with many client side technologies.

sections.title: Games
sections.md:
###Games

Last spring, I spent a lot of time with [Unity3d](http://unity3d.com/) game engine. It enabled me to make mobile multiplayer games using AR and VR technologies ([Vuforia](https://www.qualcomm.com/products/vuforia) and [Oculus Rift](https://www.oculus.com/)), two of which actually won me hackathon prices.

sections.title: Apps
sections.md:
###Apps

Last summer, I cofounded a startup and got accepted into [StartupUCLA](http://startupucla.com/) summer accelerator, a ten-week program during which I and my co-founders developed two apps. I open sourced some of the UI components I wrote and received great feedbacks.

sections.title: Research
sections.h2: Most recently, I started making websites declaratively using React.js and it feels great!
sections.md:
###Research

Most recently, I started making websites declaratively using React.js and it feels [great](https://facebook.github.io/react/docs/why-react.html)!

sections.title: Contact
sections.md:
##Contact

Please take a look at my Github (http://github.com/zhxnlai) for more information.
